welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yamaga, where tradition and modernity meet in perfect harmony. Known for its hot springs and stunning nature, we invite you to immerse yourselves in our city's rich culture and unique charm. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Yamaga has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kumamoto Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kumamoto Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Saga Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Saga Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
